name: Swift Stitch
description:
Swift*Stitch is a game about going fast, taking the right route and trying not to crash into stuff.

What the critics say:

"Swift Stitch is impeccably designed as to never feel aimless or opaque." - TIGSource

"... if you could go back 40 years and stick this into a cabinet, then we would have an instant classic on our hands. " - 8/10 The Digital Fix

"It’s very clever, a little bit fiendish, I’m really quite fond of it..." - Rock, Paper, Shotgun

"The game calls for a careful awareness of the space you're in, and knowledge of how to twist it to your own ends." - Kill Screen
